explanation: [0-0] A man is sitting in a black car, holding a coffee cup, sticking out his tongue to the right, and making a face. There is a broken heart icon at the bottom of the screen.

[0-2] Then, the man throws away the coffee cup in his hand. The camera then cuts to an old man in blue clothes and an orange hat kneeling on the ground with a gray folding wall behind him. The coffee cup the man just threw landed on the old man. Immediately afterward, the camera cuts back to the man, who throws a black shoe, which hits the old man.
